__e: You parents have to take care of them when you are working, when you are eating, even when you are sleeping.
You may not be my little brother but you might as well be... and it's my job to protect you... and I'm sorry.
Okay, what would you do if your friend was mad at you for something you did, but they don't know that you did that thing to protect them, - and you can't say that because...
I could shield you from the world but not your heart.
Could it be that I decided that I'd rather do something to protect him... ..from having to grow up to be someone like you?
And will you, to the best of your ability protect him from harm? .
But the law also says that I have to protect you from anything bad and that's a part of my job I like.
I can't protect you from everything. But there's one thing I can do, and that's help you protect yourself.
What I can't do is protect you guys from stuff I can't even see... or understand.
I know you're scared. You wanna protect him. - You don't know what's been going on.
And you can only protect him so much, but when you see what he done,it's like the proof's in the pudding.
You said you were trying to protect him. But that's not the whole story here, is it?
I was trying to protect him from a truth he clearly couldn't accept.
You don't realize until it's too late what your parents did to protect you from the truth.
I believe shielding him from the truth, from what's real ultimately does him a disservice.
